formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \\( P = \\frac{D + (E - D) \\times \\frac{r}{k}}{k} \\) Where \( P \) is the price per share, \( D \) is the dividend per share, \( E \) is earnings per share, \( r \) is the rate of return, and \( k \) is the cost of capital.
